item.title: 加拿大央行行长对特朗普的美联储行动表示担忧
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）周二对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普试图向美国联邦储备局施压表示担忧，称他的行动已经开始打击金融市场。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem on Tuesday expressed concern about President Donald Trump's attempts to pressure the U.S. Federal Reserve, saying his actions had started to hit financial markets.】

item.title: 交易日：科技股亢奋降温，黄金依然炙手可热
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量。【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets.】

item.title: OpenAI、甲骨文、软银计划为价值 5000 亿美元的星际之门项目新建五个人工智能数据中心
item.description: OpenAI、甲骨文和软银周二宣布，计划在美国新建五个人工智能数据中心，以构建其雄心勃勃的星际之门项目。【原文：OpenAI, Oracle and SoftBank on Tuesday announced plans for five new artificial intelligence data centers in the United States to build out their ambitious Stargate project.】

item.title: ADM与Alltech将成立北美动物饲料合资企业
item.description: 谷物贸易商 Archer-Daniels-Midland 和农产品开发商 Alltech 周二表示，两家公司签署了成立北美动物饲料合资企业的协议。【原文：Grain trader Archer-Daniels-Midland and agricultural products developer Alltech signed a deal to launch a North American animal feed joint venture, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国法官倾向于在 10 月 15 日之前听取更多有关 CITGO 母公司竞购建议的简报，最终口头辩论定于 10 月 20-21 日进行，法庭文件
item.description: 这是一条突发新闻。全面报道将很快发布。【原文：This is a breaking news story. Full coverage will be available soon.】

item.title: 停播六天的吉米-金梅尔重返深夜电视节目
item.description: 吉米-基梅尔（Jimmy Kimmel）因在节目中就保守派活动家查理-柯克（Charlie Kirk）遇刺事件发表言论，被公司母公司沃尔特-迪斯尼（Walt Disney）称为 "麻木不仁"，而被停播近一周，本周二他将重返美国广播公司（ABC）的深夜电视节目阵容。【原文：Jimmy Kimmel was due to return to ABC's late-night television lineup on Tuesday after a nearly week-long suspension over his on-air remarks about the assassination of conservative activist Charlie Kirk that corporate parent Walt Disney described as "insensitive."】

item.title: 美国食品和药物管理局拒绝批准提高百健公司遗传性疾病药物的剂量
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局拒绝批准百健公司治疗一种导致进行性肌无力的罕见遗传性疾病的高剂量药物，这使该公司在激烈的市场竞争中巩固地位的努力遭遇挫折。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has declined to approve a higher-dose version of Biogen's drug for a rare genetic disorder that causes progressive muscle weakness, dealing a setback to the company's efforts to strengthen its position in a competitive market, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 黑天鹅 "基金 Universa 称美股在历史性暴跌前可能再涨 20
item.description: 尾部风险对冲基金 Universa Investments 认为，市场的亢奋情绪可能会让美股再涨 20%，然后就会出现 1929 年那样规模的崩盘，从而引发全球经济衰退。【原文：Market euphoria could carry U.S. stocks another 20% higher before giving way to a collapse on the scale of the 1929 crash that ushered in a global recession, according to tail-risk hedge fund Universa Investments.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，加密货币公司 Tether 在主要一轮融资中着眼于 5000 亿美元的估值
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，加密货币巨头 Tether 正在洽谈私募融资，融资额高达 200 亿美元，这可能使这家总部位于萨尔瓦多的公司估值达到约 5000 亿美元。【原文：Crypto giant Tether is in talks to raise as much as $20 billion in a private placement that could value the El Salvador-based firm at about $500 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: Performance Food 称 Sachem Head 的弗格森加入董事会
item.description: 激进投资者斯科特-弗格森（Scott Ferguson）将加入 Performance Food Group 董事会，该公司周二表示，对冲基金正在敦促这家食品分销商考虑与竞争对手 US Foods Holding 合并。【原文：Activist investor Scott Ferguson is joining the board of Performance Food Group , the company said on Tuesday, at a time the hedge fund is urging the food distributor to consider merging with rival US Foods Holding .】

item.title: 波音公司国防与太空部门与 Palantir 合作采用人工智能
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，已与 Palantir Technologies 公司合作，在该公司的国防和太空部门使用该软件公司的人工智能解决方案平台。【原文：Boeing has partnered with Palantir Technologies to use the software firm's AI solutions platform across the planemaker's defense and space unit, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道特朗普政府在贷款谈判中寻求入股美洲锂业公司
item.description: 两位熟悉相关讨论的人士告诉路透社，特朗普政府正在寻求获得多达10%的美洲锂业公司股权，以重新谈判能源部为该公司与通用汽车公司的Thacker Pass锂项目提供的22.6亿美元贷款条款。【原文：The Trump administration is seeking an equity stake of as much as 10% in Lithium Americas as it renegotiates terms of the company's $2.26 billion Energy Department loan for its Thacker Pass lithium project with General Motors , two people familiar with the discussions told Reuters.】

item.title: 受人工智能需求影响，美光预计第一季度营收高于预期
item.description: 美光科技公司（Micron Technology）周二预测第一季度营收将高于市场预期，该公司押注人工智能硬件需求的蓬勃发展将促进其先进存储芯片的销售。【原文：Micron Technology forecast first-quarter revenue above market estimates on Tuesday, betting on booming demand for artificial intelligence hardware to boost sales of its advanced memory chips.】

item.title: 石油公司要求巴西反垄断监管机构干预 Subsea7-Saipem 合并案
item.description: 路透社看到的公开文件显示，埃克森美孚、巴西国营石油公司（Petrobras）和石油服务提供商 TechnipFMC 向巴西反垄断监管机构 Cade 申请干预能源承包商 Subsea7 和 Saipem 之间的合并。【原文：Exxon Mobil , Brazilian state-run Petrobras and oil services provider TechnipFMC petitioned the country's antitrust regulator Cade to intervene in a merger between energy contractors Subsea7 and Saipem , public documents seen by Reuters show.】

item.title: 独家新闻：消息人士称，根据美国的新授权，雪佛龙公司委内瑞拉石油出口量减半
item.description: 三位接近此事的消息人士称，根据华盛顿制定的最新规定，美国石油巨头雪佛龙公司（Chevron）只能出口其合资企业在委内瑞拉生产的约一半原油。【原文：U.S. oil major Chevron is only able to export about half the crude its joint ventures produce in Venezuela with the latest rules laid out by Washington, three sources close to the matter said.】

item.title: Disney+ 将连续第四年提高订阅价格
item.description: 迪斯尼公司周二表示，将于下月提高其旗舰产品 "迪斯尼+"流媒体服务在美国的价格，这家娱乐巨头正努力提高其数字平台的利润。【原文：Walt Disney said on Tuesday it will raise prices for its flagship Disney+ streaming service in the United States next month, as the entertainment giant pushes to bolster profits from its digital platforms.】

item.title: 加拿大央行行长：特朗普正在引发对美国货币政策独立性的质疑
item.description: 作者：Promit Mukherjee 和 David Ljunggren【原文：By Promit Mukherjee and David Ljunggren】

item.title: 首席执行官称 Exelon 将加大力度推动拥有大西洋中部电厂
item.description: 美国大型电力公司 Exelon 首席执行官卡尔文-巴特勒（Calvin Butler）本周告诉路透社，Exelon 计划明年在其大西洋中部服务区加大力度发展自己的发电厂。【原文：Major U.S. electric utility Exelon plans to step up its push to own power plants in its Mid-Atlantic service area next year, where electricity bills are spiking in the face of rising demand and new supplies are slow to be added, CEO Calvin Butler told Reuters this week.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，蒙特利尔银行考虑出售部分美国分行
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，蒙特利尔银行最近启动了出售其部分美国分行的程序，这些分行的存款额约为 60 亿美元。【原文：Bank of Montreal has recently launched a process to sell some of its U.S. branches with about $6 billion in deposits, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大官员称，TikTok 将改进措施，让儿童远离应用程序
item.description: 加拿大隐私官员周二表示，加拿大的一项调查发现，TikTok 阻止儿童访问其网站和应用程序并保护个人信息的措施不够充分，因此 TikTok 已同意改进措施，不让儿童访问其网站和应用程序。【原文：TikTok has agreed to improve its measures to keep children off its website and app after a Canadian investigation found its steps to block children and protect personal information were inadequate, Canadian privacy officials said on Tuesday.】

item.title: VIEW 美联储鲍威尔重申就业和通胀风险不容乐观
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周二表示，该央行正处于 "充满挑战的境地"，通胀速度超过预期的风险持续存在，与此同时，就业增长疲软也引发了人们对劳动力市场健康状况的担忧。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said on Tuesday the central bank is in a "challenging situation" with an ongoing risk of faster-than-expected inflation at the same time that weak job growth has raised concern about the health of the labor market.】

item.title: 美洲开发银行集团将 5000 亿美元的拉丁美洲贷款池作为全球投资目标
item.description: 美洲开发银行（Inter-American Development Bank）周二表示，该银行旨在通过帮助将高达 5000 亿美元的地区性地方贷款转变为可投资的全球资产，从而吸引私人资本进入拉丁美洲。【原文：The Inter-American Development Bank is aiming to attract private capital to Latin America by helping turn a pool of up to $500 billion of regional local loans into investable global assets, the lender said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 主要汽车制造商呼吁美国环保署放宽尾气排放规定
item.description: 代表几乎所有主要汽车制造商的一个团体周二要求特朗普政府撤销激进的汽车尾气排放限制，这些限制旨在迫使汽车行业生产越来越多的电动汽车。【原文：A group representing nearly all major automakers asked the Trump administration Tuesday to rollback aggressive vehicle emissions limits that seek to force the industry to build a rising number of electric vehicles.】

item.title: Meta 在 WhatsApp 上推出实时翻译功能
item.description: Meta Platforms 周二表示，将为其 WhatsApp 消息服务推出翻译功能，旨在方便其 30 多亿用户进行跨语言聊天。【原文：Meta Platforms on Tuesday said it is introducing a translation feature for its WhatsApp messaging service, aiming to ease cross‑language chats among its more than 3 billion users.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔：就业下行风险改变了风险平衡，促使上周降息
item.description: 这是一条突发新闻。全面报道将很快发布。【原文：This is a breaking news story. Full coverage will be available soon.】

item.title: ELFA 称 8 月份美国商业设备借款下降
item.description: 美国设备租赁与融资协会（ELFA）周二称，8月份美国公司的设备融资借款比去年同期减少了2%。【原文：U.S. companies borrowed 2% less to finance equipment in August than a year earlier, the Equipment Leasing and Finance Association (ELFA) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克称美国经济仍存在通胀风险
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周二表示，美国经济仍存在通胀风险，不过他指出，到目前为止，唐纳德-特朗普总统的进口税上调政策并未像人们预期的那样推高物价。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said Tuesday inflation risks are still in play in the U.S. economy, although he noted that thus far President Donald Trump's import tax hikes have not pushed up prices the way they were expected to.】

item.title: 中国海康威视将挑战加拿大法院批准的停产令
item.description: 中国监控摄像机制造商海康威视周二表示，将对法院维持加拿大政府停止在加拿大运营的命令的裁决提出质疑。【原文：Chinese surveillance camera manufacturer Hikvision said on Tuesday it would challenge a court decision upholding a Canadian government order to cease operations in Canada.】

item.title: Nexstar 将继续抢先播出 "Jimmy Kimmel Live "节目
item.description: Nexstar Media Group 周二表示，尽管迪斯尼公司周一宣布将恢复播出《吉米-金梅尔现场秀》，但该公司计划通过播放其他节目，继续在其 ABC 附属公司上抢先播出该节目。【原文：Nexstar Media Group said Tuesday it plans to continue to preempt “Jimmy Kimmel Live!” on its ABC affiliates by running other programming, despite Disney's announcement on Monday that it will resume airing the show.】

item.title: 欧洲央行西波罗内预计 2029 年推出数字欧元
item.description: 欧洲央行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波隆（Piero Cipollone）周二表示，欧洲央行认为 2029 年是推出数字欧元的现实时间，数字欧元主要是由央行支持的在线支付钱包。【原文：The European Central Bank eyes 2029 as a realistic timeline for launching a digital euro, essentially an online payment wallet backed by the central bank, ECB board member Piero Cipollone said on Tuesday.】
